scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:complaint" "npm run start:crawler" "npm run start:identity"
scripts.start:gateway: cd api-gateway && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:complaint: cd ml-services/complaint && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py
scripts.start:crawler: cd ml-services/app-crawler && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app_api.py
scripts.start:identity: cd ml-services/identity-verifier && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py
